statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.headline: Pepperdine edges Portland 67-63
article.story: MALIBU, Calif. -- Shawn Olden scored 15 points and Jeremy Major added 14 more to lead Pepperdine to a 67-63 win over Portland on Saturday night. Jett Raines contributed 13 points and Atif Russell added 10 for Pepperdine (12-6, 5-2 West Coast Conference). The Waves shot just 39 percent on 51 attempts from the field, lost the rebound battle 36-32 but edged Portland 22-13 in made free throws. Portland (11-8, 2-5) shot 42 percent from the floor and hung on to a narrow lead much of the second half. But late in the period, Pepperdine closed a six-point deficit and tied it at 52 on a dunk from Raines, who followed it up with the go-ahead 3-pointer with 3:33 to go. The Waves protected the advantage down the stretch with 12-of-16 shooting from the free throw line. Kevin Bailey led Portland with 28 points and Thomas van der Mars had 12 rebounds.
